animes.title: The Agency
animes.artist: Michael Fassbender, Jeffrey Wright, Jodie Turner-Smith, Katherine Waterston
animes.description: Covert CIA agent Martian is ordered to abandon his undercover life and return to London Station. When the love he left behind reappears, romance reignites. His career, his real identity and his mission are pitted against his heart; hurling them both into a deadly game of international intrigue and espionage.

animes.title: Yellowstone
animes.artist: Luke Grimes, Kelly Reilly, Wes Bentley, Cole Hauser
animes.description: Follow the violent world of the Dutton family, who controls the largest contiguous ranch in the United States. Led by their patriarch John Dutton, the family defends their property against constant attack by land developers, an Indian reservation, and America’s first National Park.

animes.title: The Madness
animes.artist: Colman Domingo, Marsha Stephanie Blake, Deon Cole, Thaddeus J. Mixson
animes.description: After a media pundit stumbles upon a dead body deep in the Poconos woods, he finds himself framed for the murder of a notorious white supremacist.
animes.genre: Drama, Action & Adventure, Crime, Mystery & Thriller

animes.title: The Day of the Jackal
animes.artist: Eddie Redmayne, Lashana Lynch, Úrsula Corberó, Charles Dance
animes.description: The Jackal is an elusive assassin who makes his living carrying out hits for the highest fee. He soon meets his match in a tenacious British intelligence officer who tracks him down in a thrilling cat-and-mouse chase across Europe.
animes.genre: Drama, Mystery & Thriller, Crime, Action & Adventure

animes.title: From
animes.artist: Harold Perrineau, Catalina Sandino Moreno, Eion Bailey, David Alpay
animes.description: Unravel the mystery of a city in middle U.S.A. that imprisons everyone who enters. As the residents struggle to maintain a sense of normality and seek a way out, they must also survive the threats of the surrounding forest.

animes.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
animes.artist: Steve Martin, John Candy, Laila Robins, Michael McKean
animes.author: John Hughes
animes.description: An irritable marketing executive, Neal Page, is heading home to Chicago for Thanksgiving when a number of delays force him to travel with a well meaning but overbearing shower curtain ring salesman, Del Griffith.

animes.title: A Man on the Inside
animes.artist: Ted Danson, Mary Elizabeth Ellis, Stephanie Beatriz, Lilah Richcreek Estrada
animes.description: Charles, a retired man, gets a new lease on life when he answers an ad from a PI and becomes a mole in a secret investigation.

animes.title: Landman
animes.artist: Billy Bob Thornton, Demi Moore, Ali Larter, Michelle Randolph
animes.description: Set in the proverbial boomtowns of West-Texas and a modern-day tale of fortune-seeking in the world of oil rigs, the series is an upstairs/downstairs story of roughnecks and wildcat billionaires that are fueling a boom so big it’s reshaping our climate, our economy and our geopolitics.

animes.title: Silo
animes.artist: Rebecca Ferguson, Common, Harriet Walter, Chinaza Uche
animes.description: Men and women live in a giant silo underground with several regulations which they believe are in place to protect them from the toxic and ruined world on the surface.

animes.title: Lioness
animes.artist: Zoe Saldaña, Laysla De Oliveira, Dave Annable, Jill Wagner
animes.description: Cruz Manuelos, a rough-around-the-edges but passionate young Marine, is recruited to join the CIA's Lioness Engagement Team to help bring down a terrorist organization from within. Joe, the station chief of the Lioness program, is tasked with training, managing and leading her female undercover operatives.
animes.genre: War & Military, Drama, Action & Adventure, Mystery & Thriller

animes.title: Conclave
animes.artist: Ralph Fiennes, Stanley Tucci, John Lithgow, Isabella Rossellini
animes.author: Edward Berger
animes.description: When Cardinal Lawrence is tasked with leading one of the world's most secretive and ancient events, selecting a new Pope, he finds himself at the center of a conspiracy that could shake the very foundation of the Catholic Church.

animes.title: The Bureau
animes.artist: Mathieu Kassovitz, Sara Giraudeau, Stefan Crepon, Zineb Triki
animes.description: Within the DGSE (General Directorate for External Security), a department called the Office Of Legends (BDL) forms and remote pilot the most important agents of the French intelligence services: Clandestine. Immersion in hostile country, their mission is to identify individuals who may be recruited as sources of information. Operating "under caption", that is to say in a fabricated identity from scratch, they live for many years in a permanent duplicity. Our hero just returned from a clandestine mission six years in Damascus. But contrary to what is required by safety rules, he does not abandon his legend and the identity under which he lived in Syria, thus putting in danger the whole system.
animes.genre: Crime, Drama, Mystery & Thriller, Made in Europe

animes.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
animes.artist: Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Jeffrey Tambor, Christine Baranski
animes.author: Ron Howard
animes.description: The Grinch decides to rob Whoville of Christmas - but a dash of kindness from little Cindy Lou Who and her family may be enough to melt his heart...

animes.title: Dear Santa
animes.artist: Robert Timothy Smith, Jack Black, Keegan-Michael Key, Brianne Howey
animes.author: Bobby Farrelly
animes.description: Likeable 6th grader Liam writes to Santa asking him to prove that he's real. But Liam is dyslexic and accidentally sends his letter to Satan instead, who shows up at Liam's house, excited to have his first fanboy letter and wanting a little of Liam's soul.

animes.title: Shrinking
animes.artist: Harrison Ford, Jason Segel, Jessica Williams, Luke Tennie
animes.description: Jimmy is struggling to grieve the loss of his wife while being a dad, friend, and therapist. He decides to try a new approach with everyone in his path: unfiltered, brutal honesty.

animes.title: The Substance
animes.artist: Demi Moore, Margaret Qualley, Dennis Quaid, Gore Abrams
animes.author: Coralie Fargeat
animes.description: A fading celebrity decides to use a black market drug, a cell-replicating substance that temporarily creates a younger, better version of herself.

animes.title: Earth Abides
animes.artist: Alexander Ludwig, Jessica Frances Dukes, Aaron Tveit, Rodrigo Fernandez-Stoll
animes.description: When a plague of unprecedented virulence sweeps the globe, the human race is all but wiped out. In the aftermath, as the great machine of civilization slowly and inexorably breaks down, only a few shattered survivors remain to struggle against the slide into extinction.

animes.title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
animes.artist: Chevy Chase, Beverly D'Angelo, Juliette Lewis, Johnny Galecki
animes.author: Jeremiah S. Chechik
animes.description: It's Christmastime, and the Griswolds are preparing for a family seasonal celebration. But things never run smoothly for Clark, his wife Ellen, and their two kids. Clark's continual bad luck is worsened by his obnoxious family guests, but he manages to keep going, knowing that his Christmas bonus is due soon.

animes.title: WKRP in Cincinnati
animes.artist: Gary Sandy, Howard Hesseman, Tim Reid, Loni Anderson
animes.description: When a Cincinnati radio station switches from sedate music to top-40 rock 'n' roll, its staff of oddball characters is forced to switch gears quickly. New programming director Andy Travis brings in a new DJ named Venus Flytrap to work with the station's burned-out veteran, Dr. Johnny Fever. Neurotic newsman Les Nessman, eager beaver Bailey Quarters, sleazy salesman Herb Tarlek, blonde bombshell Jennifer Marlowe, who serves as the station's ultra-capable receptionist, and station manager Arthur Carlson, whose domineering mother owns WKRP, round out the eccentric bunch.

animes.title: Elf
animes.artist: Will Ferrell, James Caan, Bob Newhart, Ed Asner
animes.author: Jon Favreau
animes.description: When young Buddy falls into Santa's gift sack on Christmas Eve, he's transported back to the North Pole and raised as a toy-making elf by Santa's helpers. But as he grows into adulthood, he can't shake the nagging feeling that he doesn't belong. Buddy vows to visit Manhattan and find his real dad, a workaholic.

animes.title: Senna
animes.artist: Gabriel Leone, Kaya Scodelario, Alice Wegmann, Camila Márdila
animes.description: Fictional miniseries based on the life of Ayrton Senna da Silva, the Brazilian racing legend who won the Formula One World Drivers' Championship three times.

animes.title: Arcane
animes.artist: Hailee Steinfeld, Ella Purnell
animes.description: Set in Utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League of Legends champions and the power that will tear them apart.
animes.genre: Drama, Fantasy, Science-Fiction, Animation, Action & Adventure, Mystery & Thriller

animes.title: The Grinch
animes.artist: Benedict Cumberbatch, Rashida Jones, Kenan Thompson, Cameron Seely
animes.author: Scott Mosier, Yarrow Cheney
animes.description: The Grinch hatches a scheme to ruin Christmas when the residents of Whoville plan their annual holiday celebration.
animes.genre: Fantasy, Animation, Comedy, Drama, Kids & Family, Made in Europe

animes.title: Outlander
animes.artist: Caitríona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Richard Rankin, Sophie Skelton
animes.description: Claire Beauchamp Randall, a nurse in World War II, mysteriously goes back in time to Scotland in 1743. There, she meets a dashing Highland warrior and gets drawn into an epic rebellion.

animes.title: What We Do in the Shadows
animes.artist: Kayvan Novak, Matt Berry, Natasia Demetriou, Harvey Guillén
animes.description: A documentary-style look into the daily (or rather, nightly) lives of a group of vampires in Staten Island who have “lived” together for hundreds and hundreds of years.

animes.title: Get Millie Black
animes.artist: Tamara Lawrance, Joe Dempsie, Gershwyn Eustache Jnr, Chyna McQueen
animes.description: Ex Scotland Yard detective Millie-Jean Black returns to Kingston to work missing persons; soon finding herself on a quest to save a sister who won’t be saved, to find a boy who can’t be found, to solve a case that will blow her world apart and prove almost as tough to crack as Millie Black.

animes.title: Home Alone
animes.artist: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, Catherine O'Hara
animes.author: Chris Columbus
animes.description: Eight-year-old Kevin McCallister makes the most of the situation after his family unwittingly leaves him behind when they go on Christmas vacation. But when a pair of bungling burglars set their sights on Kevin's house, the plucky kid stands ready to defend his territory. By planting booby traps galore, adorably mischievous Kevin stands his ground as his frantic mother attempts to race home before Christmas Day.

animes.title: The Penguin
animes.artist: Colin Farrell, Cristin Milioti, Rhenzy Feliz, Deirdre O'Connell
animes.description: Follow Oswald "Oz" Cobb’s quest for control as he seeks to fill the power vacuum left by the death of Carmine Falcone, transforming from a disfigured nobody to a noted mobster in Gotham City.

animes.title: Dune: Prophecy
animes.artist: Emily Watson, Olivia Williams, Jodhi May, Travis Fimmel
animes.description: Ten thousand years before the ascension of Paul Atreides, sisters Valya and Tula Harkonnen sisters establish the fabled sect and female order that would become known as the Bene Gesserit to control the future of humankind.

animes.title: Cold Case: Who Killed JonBenét Ramsey
animes.description: Nearly 30 years since her murder, a three-part Netflix series revisits the death of JonBenét Ramsey, the child beauty queen killed in her Colorado home, featuring interviews with key figures including her father.

animes.title: Die Hard
animes.artist: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Alexander Godunov, Bonnie Bedelia
animes.author: John McTiernan
animes.description: NYPD cop John McClane's plan to reconcile with his estranged wife is thrown for a serious loop when, minutes after he arrives at her office, the entire building is overtaken by a group of terrorists. With little help from the LAPD, wisecracking McClane sets out to single-handedly rescue the hostages and bring the bad guys down.

animes.title: Slow Horses
animes.artist: Gary Oldman, Jack Lowden, Kristin Scott Thomas, Hugo Weaving
animes.description: Follow a dysfunctional team of MI5 agents—and their obnoxious boss, the notorious Jackson Lamb—as they navigate the espionage world's smoke and mirrors to defend England from sinister forces.

animes.title: Thanksgiving
animes.artist: Patrick Dempsey, Nell Verlaque, Addison Rae, Ty Olsson
animes.author: Eli Roth
animes.description: After a Black Friday riot ends in tragedy, a mysterious Thanksgiving-inspired killer terrorizes Plymouth, Massachusetts - the birthplace of the holiday. Picking off residents one by one, what begins as random revenge killings are soon revealed to be part of a larger, sinister holiday plan.

animes.title: Bad Sisters
animes.artist: Sharon Horgan, Anne-Marie Duff, Eva Birthistle, Sarah Greene
animes.description: Follows the Garvey sisters, who are bound together by the death of their parents and a promise to always protect each other.

animes.title: Black Doves
animes.artist: Keira Knightley, Ben Whishaw, Sarah Lancashire, Andrew Buchan
animes.description: When a spy's secret lover is killed, an assassin is assigned to protect her life as she investigates the murder. Together they uncover a vast interconnected conspiracy that leads them to question the cost of their moral choices.

animes.title: St. Denis Medical
animes.artist: Wendi McLendon-Covey, David Alan Grier, Allison Tolman, Josh Lawson
animes.description: An eclectic group of underfunded yet dedicated doctors and nurses navigates caring for patients — and each other — while keeping it all together at an Oregon hospital.

animes.title: Person of Interest
animes.artist: Jim Caviezel, Michael Emerson, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker
animes.description: John Reese, former CIA paramilitary operative, is presumed dead and teams up with reclusive billionaire Finch to prevent violent crimes in New York City by initiating their own type of justice. With the special training that Reese has had in Covert Operations and Finch's genius software inventing mind, the two are a perfect match for the job that they have to complete. With the help of surveillance equipment, they work "outside the law" and get the right criminal behind bars.
animes.genre: Science-Fiction, Drama, Action & Adventure, Crime, Mystery & Thriller

animes.title: The Diplomat
animes.artist: Keri Russell, Rufus Sewell, David Gyasi, Ali Ahn
animes.description: In the midst of an international crisis, a career diplomat lands in a high-profile job she’s unsuited for, with tectonic implications for her marriage and her political future.

animes.title: Friends
animes.artist: Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc
animes.description: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty year-old friends living in the Manhattan borough of New York City.

animes.title: Fallout
animes.artist: Ella Purnell, Aaron Moten, Moisés Arias, Walton Goggins
animes.description: In a future, post-apocalyptic Los Angeles brought about by nuclear decimation, citizens must live in underground bunkers to protect themselves from radiation, mutants and bandits.

animes.title: The World
animes.artist: Zhao Tao, Cheng Taishen, Jue Jing, Jiang Zhong Wei
animes.author: Jia Zhangke
animes.description: At Beijing World Park, a bizarre cross-pollination of Las Vegas and Epcot Center where visitors can interact with famous international monuments without ever leaving the city’s suburbs, a security guard betrays his dancer girlfriend by pursuing another woman.

animes.title: World War Z
animes.artist: Brad Pitt, Mireille Enos, Daniella Kertesz, James Badge Dale
animes.author: Marc Forster
animes.description: Life for former United Nations investigator Gerry Lane and his family seems content. Suddenly, the world is plagued by a mysterious infection turning whole human populations into rampaging mindless zombies. After barely escaping the chaos, Lane is persuaded to go on a mission to investigate this disease. What follows is a perilous trek around the world where Lane must brave horrific dangers and long odds to find answers before human civilization falls.
animes.genre: Horror, Science-Fiction, Mystery & Thriller, Action & Adventure

animes.title: World Poker Tour
animes.description: Poker players from around the world compete for large cash prizes

animes.title: World Series of Poker
animes.description: The World Series of Poker is a series of poker tournaments held annually in Las Vegas and, since 2004, sponsored by Caesars Entertainment Corporation. It dates its origins to 1970, when Benny Binion invited seven of the best-known poker players to the Horseshoe Casino for a single tournament, with a set start and stop time, and a winner determined by a secret ballot of the seven players.

animes.title: World Trade Center
animes.artist: Nicolas Cage, Michael Peña, Maria Bello, Maggie Gyllenhaal
animes.author: Oliver Stone
animes.description: Two police officers struggle to survive when they become trapped beneath the rubble of the World Trade Center on September 11, 2001.

animes.title: World Trigger
animes.artist: Nao Tamura, Yuichi Nakamura, Tomo Muranaka, Yuki Kaji
animes.description: A gate to another dimension has burst open, and from it emerge gigantic invincible creatures that threaten all of humanity. Earth's only defense is a mysterious group of warriors who have co-opted the alien technology in order to fight back!

animes.title: World of Dance
animes.artist: Jennifer Lopez, Ne-Yo, Derek Hough, Jenna Dewan
animes.description: Dancers battle in heats of artistry, precision and athleticism in this reality-competition show.
animes.genre: Reality TV, Kids & Family, Music & Musical

animes.title: MLB World Series
animes.artist: Joe Buck, Jeanne Zelasko, Tim McCarver, Chris Myers
animes.description: Each World Series film showcases iconic moments, thrilling heroics and more from the Fall Classic.

animes.title: World's Craziest Fools
animes.artist: Rupert Vansittart, Mr. T
animes.description: World's Craziest Fools is a clip show made by Roughcut TV for BBC Three, presented by Mr. T. It showcases clips, sometimes viral, of people making themselves look like "Fools", often by accident. Many clips were from CCTV footage. The videos were shown in different categories such as "Parking Fools", "Drunk Fools", "Criminal Fools", and "Fools jumping off things they shouldn't be jumping off of". As would be expected, some categories see more entries than others, and the categories that feature episode-to-episode are not bound to a predetermined structure.

animes.title: World War Two
animes.artist: Indy Neidell, Spartacus Olsson
animes.author: Spartacus Olsson
animes.description: Follow the deadliest conflict in human history in real time, week by week, blow by blow.
animes.genre: Documentary, War & Military, History, Made in Europe

animes.title: World War Weird
animes.artist: Alexandra Churchill, Dominic Selwood
animes.description: Unusual, strange, weird plans, plots that took place, or planned to take place during World War Two.

animes.title: World's Most Evil Killers
animes.artist: Geoffrey Wansell, Elizabeth Yardley, Fred Dinenage
animes.description: World’s Most Evil Killers delves into the gripping real-life stories of the world’s most terrifying and prolific killers. From Fred and Rose West to Ed Gein – The Clown Killer – and even to The Milwaukee Cannibal. Each episode focuses on one notorious killer and features authentic first-hand accounts of their behavior, from detectives who ran the case, journalists who reported on the stories, relatives, and at times survivors, alongside series experts who provide analysis. These criminologists, crime journalists and psychologists examine how the infamous killers made headlines both nationally and internationally and why they still continue to evoke fear and fascination in the public eye.

animes.title: World Dice Tour
animes.artist: Pani Bottle, Kwak Joon-bin, Lee Won-ji, Noh Hong-chul
animes.author: Kim Tae-ho, Kim Hoon-beom
animes.description: Three travel content creators competing to win a trip to space embark on the adventure of a lifetime, rolling the dice to decide where they'll go next.

animes.title: World of Quest
animes.artist: Ron Pardo, Landon Norris, Kedar Brown, James Rankin
animes.description: World of Quest is a Canadian animated series based on the graphic novel story by Jason Kruse published by Komikwerks.
animes.genre: Animation, Comedy, Science-Fiction, Kids & Family, Music & Musical, Action & Adventure

animes.title: World's Funniest
animes.artist: Terry Crews
animes.description: Home videos of people not quite at their best.

animes.title: World War II in Colour
animes.artist: Robert Powell, Adolf Hitler, Winston Churchill, Franklin D. Roosevelt
animes.description: World War II In Colour is a 13-episode television documentary miniseries recounting the events of World War II narrated by Robert Powell. The show covers the Western Front, Eastern Front, and the Pacific War. It is on syndication in America on the Military Channel. This series is in full color, combining both original and colorized footage.
animes.genre: Documentary, War & Military, History, Made in Europe

animes.title: World of Winx
animes.artist: Carole Baillien, Alice Ley, Esther Aflalo, Mélanie Dermont
animes.description: The Winx travel all over the world searching for talent for WOW. and preventing the mysterious talent thief from kidnapping them.
animes.genre: Animation, Action & Adventure, Comedy, Kids & Family, Fantasy, Made in Europe

animes.title: World's Deadliest
animes.artist: Jeremy Davidson
animes.description: The Animal Kingdom is rife with deadly snakes.

animes.title: World's End Harem
animes.artist: Keiko Watanabe, Taichi Ichikawa, Haruka Shiraishi, You Taichi
animes.description: The Man-Killer Virus: a lethal disease that has eradicated 99.9% of the world's male population. Mizuhara Reito has been in cryogenic sleep for the past five years, leaving behind Tachibana Erisa, the girl of his dreams. When Reito awakens from the deep freeze, he emerges into a sex-crazed new world where he himself is the planet's most precious resource. Reito and four other male studs are given lives of luxury and one simple mission: repopulate the world by impregnating as many women as possible! All Reito wants, however, is to find his beloved Erisa who went missing three years ago. Can Reito resist temptation and find his one true love?
animes.genre: Animation, Drama, Science-Fiction, Mystery & Thriller, Romance

animes.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman
animes.artist: Aoi Yuki, Ayana Taketatsu, Kaito Ishikawa, Maaya Uchida
animes.description: The scenery takes place in a private high school involving the concept of "saviors." They are known as people who possess awakened memories of their past lives. The story tells of a young boy named Moroha Haimura who comes to this private school. At the school, there are two types of people: Saviors, who fight enemies with weapons and techniques gleaned from the Puraana powers from their own bodies, and Kuroma, who wipe out enemies with magic to manipulate the Maana powers that surpass physics. Moroha Haimura is the first person with past lives of both Shirogane and Kuroma.

animes.title: World on Fire
animes.artist: Jonah Hauer-King, Julia Brown, Helen Hunt, Zofia Wichłacz
animes.description: World War II-era drama centered on the lives of ordinary people affected by the war.

animes.title: World of Giants
animes.artist: Marshall Thompson, Arthur Franz
animes.description: World Of Giants is an American spy-fi television series that aired from September 5 until November 28, 1959.

animes.title: World War II: From the Frontlines
animes.artist: John Boyega
animes.description: Through vividly enhanced archival footage and voices from all sides of the conflict, this docuseries brings WWII to life like never before.

animes.title: Jurassic World Dominion
animes.artist: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Laura Dern, Sam Neill
animes.author: Colin Trevorrow
animes.description: Four years after Isla Nublar was destroyed, dinosaurs now live—and hunt—alongside humans all over the world. This fragile balance will reshape the future and determine, once and for all, whether human beings are to remain the apex predators on a planet they now share with history's most fearsome creatures.

animes.title: World's Most Extreme Homes
animes.artist: Ruth England
animes.description: It may look weird to an onlooker but it's home, sweet, home to the owners of the most bizarre and unusual dwellings around the world.

animes.title: World's Greatest Palaces
animes.artist: Christien Anholt
animes.description: The history of the greatest and most lavish palaces in the world.

animes.title: World's Funniest Animals
animes.artist: Elizabeth Stanton
animes.description: Host Elizabeth Stanton and a celebrity guest panel look at animals doing the funniest things ever caught on video. The series includes viral internet clips of funny animal moments, hilarious animal clips from major motion pictures and popular TV series, animal outtakes that surprise the whole cast and crew, videos of babies and pets, as well as celebrities and their pets.

animes.title: Jurassic World
animes.artist: Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard, Irrfan Khan, Vincent D'Onofrio
animes.author: Colin Trevorrow
animes.description: Twenty-two years after the events of Jurassic Park, Isla Nublar now features a fully functioning dinosaur theme park, Jurassic World, as originally envisioned by John Hammond.

animes.title: World's Greatest Dad
animes.artist: Robin Williams, Alexie Gilmore, Daryl Sabara, Evan Martin
animes.author: Bobcat Goldthwait
animes.description: In the wake of a freak accident, Lance suffers the worst tragedy and the greatest opportunity of his life. He is suddenly faced with the possibility of fame, fortune and popularity, if he can only live with the knowledge of how he got there.

animes.title: World War 2: The Call of Duty - A Complete Timeline
animes.author: Liam Dale
animes.description: Track the main events of World War II with the help of remarkable archive footage in this extensive 24 episode series, which shines a spotlight on this monumental period of history.

animes.title: The World from Above
animes.artist: Philippe Sollier, Richard Mervyn
animes.description: The World from Above is a unique continuing series of aerial programmes offering an entirely different view of the world. From 10,000ft, down to just a few feet the stabilised high definition aerial camera seeks out the beautiful, as well as the dramatic, on journeys across very different parts of the world including Europe, Africa and the United States.

animes.title: World War Dead: Rise of the Fallen
animes.artist: Philip Barantini, Kacey Clarke, Robert Bladen, Kyle Frank
animes.author: Freddie Hutton-Mills, Bart Ruspoli
animes.description: To celebrate the centenary of WW1, a TV Documentary team travels to the Somme to put together a ratings smash about new mysteries relating to the famous battle. However, what they unearth is far from a new story of those that died 100 years ago – but an army of the undead and a brand new war.

animes.title: World on a Wire
animes.artist: Klaus Löwitsch, Mascha Rabben, Karl-Heinz Vosgerau, Adrian Hoven
animes.description: Cybernetics engineer Fred Stiller uncovers a massive corporate conspiracy involving a virtual reality computer project.

animes.title: Battle: Los Angeles
animes.artist: Aaron Eckhart, Ramón Rodríguez, Will Rothhaar, Michael Peña
animes.author: Jonathan Liebesman
animes.description: When once distant UFOs become a terrifying threat and an alien invasion force begins attacking Earths major costal and riverside cities, a U.S Marine staff sergeant and his team are sent into battle only to find they must take it upon themselves to defeat an unknown enemy and protect what remains of Los Angeles.

animes.title: Worlds Apart
animes.artist: J.K. Simmons, Maria Kavoyianni, Andrea Osvárt, Christopher Papakaliatis
animes.author: Christopher Papakaliatis
animes.description: Three separate narratives each following a love story between a foreigner and a Greek. Each story represents a different generation falling in love during a time of socioeconomic turmoil that dominates Southern Europe as a whole, only to connect as a single story in the end.

animes.title: World Without End
animes.artist: Oliver Maltman, David Bradley, Ben Chaplin, Charlotte Riley
animes.author: Michael Caton-Jones
animes.description: Two hundred years after the construction of the great cathedral, the medieval town of Kingsbridge is  taken under siege by Queen Isabella. Caris, a visionary young woman, inspires her people to stand up for their rights and revolt against to the most powerful forces of her time, the Church and the Crown.

animes.title: World's Most Notorious Killers
animes.description: Discover the chilling stories of five renowned international murder cases, featuring firsthand accounts from individuals close to each case and those seeking justice.

animes.title: WorldEnd: What are you doing at the end of the world? Are you busy? Will you save us?
animes.artist: Ryohei Arai, Azusa Tadokoro, Akari Uehara, Satomi Sato
animes.description: The fleeting and sad story about little girls known as fairy weapons and an associate hero that survived. This is a world after it was attacked by unidentified monsters known as beasts and many of the species in the world, including humans, had been destroyed. The species that had managed to survived left the ground and were living on a floating island called Regal Ele. Willem Kmetsch wakes up above the clouds 500 years later and couldn’t protect the ones who he wanted to protect. Actually, he was living in despair because he was the only survivor.
animes.genre: Action & Adventure, Science-Fiction, Romance, Animation, Drama, Fantasy

animes.title: World's Wildest Police Videos
animes.artist: John Bunnell
animes.description: An American reality TV series that deals with police videos from across the world. Video footage of car chases, subsequent arrests, robberies, riots and other crimes appears on the show.
animes.genre: Action & Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Reality TV, Documentary

animes.title: World of Tomorrow
animes.artist: Julia Pott, Winona Mae, Sara Cushman
animes.author: Don Hertzfeldt
animes.description: A little girl is taken on a mind-bending tour of her distant future.

result.title: The Agency
result.artist: Michael Fassbender, Jeffrey Wright, Jodie Turner-Smith, Katherine Waterston
result.description: Covert CIA agent Martian is ordered to abandon his undercover life and return to London Station. When the love he left behind reappears, romance reignites. His career, his real identity and his mission are pitted against his heart; hurling them both into a deadly game of international intrigue and espionage.
